thread.title: Dayum! Jhanvi Kapoor and boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya are totally killing it with their dance moves – watch video
thread.title_full: Dayum! Jhanvi Kapoor and boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya are totally killing it with their dance moves – watch video

author: Snehal Rajani
title: Dayum! Jhanvi Kapoor and boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya are totally killing it with their dance moves – watch video
text:
Jhanvi Kapoor, Sara Ali Khan, Krishna Shroff – meet the star kids and their non celebrity boyfriends 
After Jhanvi shared a family pic which had her boyfriend also in it, a boomerang video is all over social media which has Jhanvi showing off some thumkas along with Shikhar. Well, this isn’t the first time when the diva has come out in open about her relationship on social media. I mean even though she hasn’t ever made any official statements, the pictures in itself are a proof of the same. The internet is flooded with Jhanvi and Shikhar’s pics. And even though she is soon gonna be making her Bollywood debut, she isn’t bothered whether her relationship status would affect her Bollywood career. That’s so cool! Also, while a lot of celebs shy away from publicly admitting their relationship.. here is Jhanvi Kapoor, who wants the world to know that she is seeing this guy.The video has Jhanvi showing off her thumkas and from what it looks like that’s her boyfriend Shikhar. Check out the video below. (ALSO READ: Jhanvi Kapoor DITCHED her boyfriend to go out on a Valentine’s Day date with this hottie ) A post shared by Manish Malhotra (@manishmalhotra05) on Feb 17, 2017 at 2:25pm PST 
Woah! Jhanvi has got the moves just right! SO DAMN HOT! Don’t you think Jhanvi looks absolutely gorgeous in this Manish Malhotra styled lehenga? We definitely think so. This is just another stunning appearance made by the 19- year- old starkid. Well, all we can say is, we just cannot wait to see you on the big screen, Jhanvi! (ALSO READ: Jhanvi Kapoor’s boyfriend is OFFICIALLY a part of her family? View pics ) 
Its already very evident that Jhanvi Kapoor’s parents Boney Kapoor and Sridevi are pretty cool about her relationship with rumoured boyfriend shikhar Pahariya. Sridevi and Boney Kapoor seem to have finally accepted Jhanvi’s alleged boyfriend as they were all smiles in the pic. Also, if you closely observe the body language Jhanvi and Akshat look pretty comfortable with each other despite having parents around. This itself speaks volumes about their relationship. We are more than happy to see that. And here’s hoping that she will now make it official with her boyfriend reall soon.. 
Stay tuned to BollywoodLife for more updates.
